root.text: 该研究是关于 Sepsis 和 Septic Shock 中 Corticosteroid 的系统性回顾和分析。

source.quote: [ABSTRACT] LATE BREAKER ARTICLE Corticosteroids in Sepsis and Septic Shock: A Systematic Review, Pairwise, and Dose-Response Meta-Analysis Tyler Pitre, MD, MA1 OBJECTIVES: To perform a systematic review and meta-analysis to assess the Katherine Drover2 efficacy and safety of corticosteroids in patients with sepsis.
